title: The Mysterious Bat
description: Bats are the only mammals capable of sustained flight. They are nocturnal and use echolocation to navigate and hunt in the dark.

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of a bat's echolocation?
options: To navigate and locate prey in the dark
questions.correct_answer: To navigate and locate prey in the dark

questions.question: Which of these is a common misconception about bats?
A bat's wing is actually an elongated version of what?
What is the collective noun for a group of bats?
Which of the following describes a bat's diet?
options: Their diet varies and includes fruit, insects, fish, and blood
questions.correct_answer: Their diet varies and includes fruit, insects, fish, and blood
